name: Luxaren Allure
description:
Karuna and Aurelie were friends. Then Aurelie went off and found the infernal armor of Ellicide and became the Evil Overlord Darkloft. Karuna is the only one who can stop her. But Karuna loves Aurelie, even now.

She won't be alone on her adventure. Chisa, her trusty baby-faced, axe-wielding squire; Merel, the ruins-loving (and human-loving) naga mage; and Lynette, the prickly holy warrior from the mainland will all join her on the quest to defeat Darkloft.

Luxaren Allure is a medium-sized RPG (12-20 hours) that follows Karuna and her allies as they explore the isles of Luxaren and confront a former friend who now wants nothing but destruction. This is a wlw (women who love women, lesbian romance, yuri, etc) game with an all female playable cast.



  • Battles are turn-based but fast-paced! Enjoy animated heroes and enemies in classic side-view style reminiscent of classic RPGs!
  • Gorgeous illustrated character art by by M-3-1!
  • Explore the Isles of Luxaren and experience tales of lost love, new relationships, and a romantic twist on the hero's quest to defeat the dark lord!
  • Oops! All Lesbians! Your party is all WLW, all the time.
  • Alchemize items to boost your play along the way! There are dozens of unique items, equipment and accessories available from the alchemy pots.
  • Trouble navigating complicated dungeons? New optional Dungeon Navigation Mode activates ethereal arrows to show you the way through- or the way to avoid, if you're searching for hidden treasures!
  • Adjust the difficulty on the fly with four levels to choose from! Glide through battles to get to the next scene quicker, or torture yourself and test your skills- it's up to you to decide how you feel like playing.
